section.name: Data Export
section.p: The Data Export reporting functionality lets you export the same underlying data that is used for printable reports to xml or csv files. When selecting the Data Export option in the Create Report dialog, the following configuration options are shown:

ul.li: DataSets - select which datasets to export, only datasets that contain data are shown
Format - choose between XML and CSV
Headers - choose if you want a header row to be generated in CSV files
Folder - the folder where files will be generated

section.p: After configuring as desired and selecting OK, soapUI will export each DataSet to a correspondingly named file in the specified folder and then open the folder with the systems File Explorer
